executive_summary: Frontend engineer with about 5 years of experience delivering data-intensive applications in React and TypeScript. Built core capabilities for a Mercedes-Benz global master data and planning platform used across regions for production and supply chain operations. Drove faster releases, higher import reliability, and improved developer efficiency through platformized UI architecture, schema-driven validation, and CI modernization.
key_achievements: Established a reusable data UI platform for complex tables and forms, standardizing filters, pagination, and inline edit patterns to accelerate features and reduce review friction by about 30 percent on key modules.
Improved import reliability by about 25 percent through schema-driven validation, automated lookup reconciliation, and precise error surfacing before save.
Cut build and setup time by roughly 40 percent by delivering a Vite-based application boilerplate with environment management and automated versioning.
Strengthened reliability and governance by integrating static analysis and dependency scanning in CI, addressing issues earlier and improving audit readiness.
Aligned frontend and backend through explicit GraphQL contracts, validation semantics, auditing fields, and thin client abstractions to reduce client-side workarounds.
Optimized client-side performance using caching strategies and render tuning for data-heavy views, improving perceived load time on targeted flows.
Reduced support overhead by surfacing pre-save errors and batch error reports, lowering incidents related to import failures.
Accelerated onboarding and review by shipping documentation-first assets including READMEs, usage guides, and review checklists adopted across teams.
Delivered secure mobile access features including NFC interactions and OIDC authentication with telemetry for usage tracking.
Upgraded build pipelines and runtimes (Node and .NET) to improve stability, speed, and release predictability in Azure DevOps.

professional_experience.role: Frontend Engineer, Global master data and planning platform
professional_experience.scope: Frontend ownership for a web platform used across regions for production and supply chain planning, supporting high-volume master data updates and frequent file imports.
responsibilities: Consolidated table and form experiences into a reusable UI foundation with consistent filters, pagination, inline editing, and shared toolbars to speed delivery.
Implemented schema-driven Excel imports with early validation, automated lookup reconciliation, and precise error messages to increase first-pass success.
Co-designed GraphQL queries and mutations with backend teams and aligned validation and auditing fields to create stable contracts and predictable releases.
Embedded static analysis and dependency scanning in CI and strengthened authentication with encrypted tokens and OIDC where required to improve security posture.
Delivered a Vite boilerplate with environment management and automated versioning to shorten build cycles and accelerate onboarding.
Evolved an internal hub application from prototype to production-ready with NFC interactions and OIDC authentication for secure access and usage tracking.
Authored onboarding guides, READMEs, and review checklists; mentored junior developers; facilitated lightweight design reviews for cross-team alignment.

professional_experience.scope: Full stack feature development and cloud deployment support.
responsibilities: Built full stack features with React and GraphQL.
Supported cloud deployments and improved release reliability.

professional_experience.scope: Operational support and troubleshooting for core AWS services.
responsibilities: Handled issues related to EC2, S3, IAM, and CloudWatch.
Authored documentation and knowledge base entries for customer workflows.

select_projects.title: Global Master Data and Planning Platform (Web)
select_projects.description: Enterprise web platform enabling regional production and supply chain planning with high volume master data updates and imports.
select_projects.outcome: Operational reliability at scale with standardized UX and guardrails for data integrity.

select_projects.title: Schema-driven Import Pipeline
select_projects.description: Pre-validation and reconciliation for file-based imports with early error surfacing, coercions, and automatic lookups.
select_projects.outcome: Higher import success rates and fewer production incidents related to data quality.

select_projects.title: Build Modernization and Boilerplate
select_projects.description: Vite-based app template with environment handling and automated versioning; Webpack to Vite migrations for speed and consistency.
select_projects.outcome: About 40 percent faster builds and improved developer onboarding.

select_projects.title: Mobile Access and Authentication
select_projects.description: Internal companion app with NFC interactions, OIDC authentication, usage telemetry, and mobile navigation patterns.
select_projects.outcome: Stronger access controls, improved visibility through telemetry, and a better mobile UX.

select_projects.title: GraphQL Domain APIs
select_projects.description: Queries and mutations for pricing and classification domains with validation rules and auditing fields; clarified error semantics and improved payload efficiency.
select_projects.outcome: Clearer contracts, fewer client workarounds, and more predictable releases.

select_projects.title: Security and Compliance Enablement in CI
select_projects.description: Integrated static analysis and dependency license scanning into pipelines; remediated priority vulnerabilities and enforced guarded release policies.
select_projects.outcome: Improved security posture and smoother audit checkpoints.

select_projects.title: Material Pricing Administration
select_projects.description: Frontends and endpoints for standard parts pricing, exchange rates, surcharges, and transport costs with consistent validation and auditing.
select_projects.outcome: Streamlined pricing updates and reduced manual corrections.

select_projects.title: Workstations and Groups Administration
select_projects.description: Config UI for workstations and workplace groups using standardized table and form patterns; included bulk updates and validation.
select_projects.outcome: Faster configuration cycles and consistent data quality.

select_projects.title: Supplier Onboarding and Cost Centers
select_projects.description: UI workflows and validations for supplier onboarding and cost center management leveraging shared platform components.
select_projects.outcome: Reduced onboarding friction and improved consistency across administrative modules.

select_projects.title: Foonda
select_projects.description: AI-powered career guidance and resume builder focused on South African users with modern web UX and structured data modeling.
select_projects.outcome: Demonstrates full stack product design with AI integration, resume workflows, and robust data structures.

select_projects.title: Web NFC TypeScript Library
select_projects.description: TypeScript wrapper for the Web NFC API with permission handling, scanning, writing flows, and robust error strategies.
select_projects.outcome: Demonstrates API design, device integration, and defensive error handling.

select_projects.title: Black and White Infrastructure Migration
select_projects.description: Migration from shared hosting to AWS for improved scalability, performance, and deployment control.
select_projects.outcome: More reliable deployments and better operational visibility.

select_projects.title: E-Pharmacy System
select_projects.description: React Native and Java system for pharmacy management and delivery as a capstone project.
select_projects.outcome: Demonstrates mobile app delivery and backend integration.

select_projects.title: FindaDoctor (Competition Project)
select_projects.description: UX-first healthcare access app prototyped for the MTN ICT Challenge.
select_projects.outcome: Showcases rapid ideation and user-centered design for social impact.

select_projects.title: Portfolio Website
select_projects.description: Personal site and project hub with clean layouts and outbound links to work and credentials.
select_projects.outcome: Centralized presence for showcasing projects and achievements.

education_certifications.degree_cert: Diploma in ICT in Applications Development

additional_information: Graduate development training in agile and DevOps practices.
Recognized for delivery excellence and documentation that improves cross-team alignment.
Mentorship and workshop facilitation for onboarding and pattern adoption.
Experienced in cross-cultural collaboration with distributed teams across regions using documentation-first alignment, async reviews, and clear ownership.
